commitResults.messageTitle: Implemented skeletal working version to start, run (echo user input), and exit program.
Added chatbot customisation
Fixed bug where program does not truly exits upon saying "bye". Extracted out command detection. Added new UNKNOWN state.
Added support for various exit keywords. Adjusted program loop exiting.
Implemented list feature (detect state, add to list, read from list). Added LIST state, Changed EHCO state to ADD State. Enhanced state detection (lower first, first word only).
Enforced requirement of a "add" keyword for adding to list.
Converted ArrayList<String> to ArrayList<Task>
Added functionality for marking and marking task
Optimised & merged mark and unmark code. Added comments for future exceptions to watch for.
Implemented subclasses of Task (Todo, Deadline, Event)
Updated "add" to "todo"
Updated UI message for todo task, extracted certain print message into functions.
Implemented support for deadline- and event- typed tasks
minor changes (added comments, moved State into `Duke` class)
Added automated testing for UI (note, user input is not part of expected output). Had to clean up ending space of the logo
Added DukeException class
Implemented code to handle various exceptions.
Implemented functionality to delete task
Made Duke static methods private. Implemented default case for program loop.
Move some Duke related methods from static context into a instance context
Implement basic writing of data (in CSV format) to data file upon task creation and program exit
commitResults.messageBody:
To do:
 * implement reading from data file during program startup
 * save to file during mark/unmark/delete
 * extra: add a "save" command to allow user to save manually

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement data save upon mark/unmark/delete
commitResults.messageBody: Add "save" keyword to manually do data save

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement loading of data from file Overload constructors for Task (and children classes) for isDone Change the file save data for isDone attribute
Implement parsing to Local Date/Time/DateTime for specific String format
Provide alternative implementation for parsing date and time using built-in parsing
Update Deadline and Event class to store in LocalDateTime
